cards.rules_text: Discard your hand. Draw cards equal to the number of creatures that died this turn.

cards.rules_text: Damage can't be prevented this turn. Players can't gain life this turn. Beat & Batter deals 2 damage to target player.

cards.rules_text:
{T}, Sacrifice another permanent: Add one mana of any color.
At the beginning of your end step, if you're horrific, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. [i](You're horrific as long as you've sacrificed a permanent or discarded a card this turn.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Best not to enter Audrey's greenhouse after hours.”
 —“The Flowers that Kill in the Spring”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a Horror creature with base power and toughness 3/3.
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a creature, create a token that's a copy of Plagas Infestation and attach it to the damaged creature.

Misty Churchyard enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{1}{W}{W}: Until end of turn, Misty Churchyard becomes a 1/4 Cleric creature with “Whenever this creature is dealt damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.” Activate only if you're horrific.

Lost Station enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{U}{U}: Until end of turn, Lost Station becomes a 2/2 Horror creature that can't be blocked. Activate only if you're horrific.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Anything could be within those dark tunnels.”
—“Supernatural Stories”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Hellfire Caverns enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
{2}{R}: Until end of turn, Hellfire Caverns becomes a 3/3 Devil creature with menace. Activate only if you're horrific.

Enshrouded Village enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{1}{G}{G}: Until end of turn, Enshrouded Village becomes a 4/4 Human creature with trample. Activate only if you're horrific.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Keep your head down and don't stop.”
—“A Town Called Nowhere”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
First strike
Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast as long as their controller is horrific. [i](A player is horrific as long as they've sacrificed a permanent or discarded a card this turn.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Sally, VHS tapes can't kill people.”
—“The Collection”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
{B}, Discard a card: When you next cast a spell from your hand this turn, it gains rerun. Activate this ability only once each turn. [i](Exile it as it resolves if you cast it from your hand. Whenever a creature you control dies, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Trample
When The Shepherd of Nowhere enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices each other nontoken creature they control.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

If another creature you control would die, exile it instead.
When John Furo, the Unfortunate dies, until your next end step, you may play cards exiled with John Furo.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“It finally clicked. Anyone could've found these tapes. John wasn't special, he was just unlucky.”
—“A New Audience”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Ravenous Attraction enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever a creature you control dies, double the number of each kind of counter on Ravenous Attraction.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Don't tap the glass. He's always hungry.”
—“Trip to the Zoo”[/i]

cards.rules_text: You may have Raging Reflection enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has “When this creature enters the battlefield, it fights another target creature with the same name as it.”
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“As they say, you are your own worst enemy.”
—“10/31/78”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Aspiring Hero attacks alone, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
When Aspiring Hero dies, each opponent gains life equal to its power.
cards.flavor_text: [i]John was ecstatic to see someone heroic in these godforsaken tapes. At least, until he saw what happened to her.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Defender
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may exile target permanent card from your graveyard.
Sacrifice a land: Put a card exiled with Corpsebark into its owner's hand.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The dead crawl out of every crevice they can.”
—“Midnight Hike”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Demented Brainiac enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent mills two cards.
{U}, Sacrifice Demented Brainiac: Exile each opponent's graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast instant and sorcery spells exiled this way, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no noncreature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“There's no more room in hell.”
—“Funeral for the Human Race”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Sunken Homestead enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{2}{B}: Until end of turn, Sunken Homestead becomes a 2/2 Zombie creature with “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield.” Activate only if you're horrific.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a noncreature permanent.
Search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed permanent's mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice another nontoken creature: Create two tokens that are copies of the sacrificed creature, except they have base power and toughness 0/1. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Your life is no longer pointless. I will fashion... a memento for you.”
—“The Dollmaker of East Street”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Zealous Rabble gets +1/+1 for each creature token you control.
At the beginning of your end step, if you're horrific, create a token that's a copy of Zealous Rabble, except it doesn't have this ability. [i](You're horrific as long as you've sacrificed a permanent or discarded a card this turn.)[/i]

Flying
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature that died this turn.
Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices each creature they control, then puts all creature cards they own exiled this way onto the battlefield. Exile Sea of Corpses.

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player discards a card. If that player has no cards in hand, they instead sacrifice a permanent. If they control no permanents, they instead lose the game.

Menace
Discard a creature card or sacrifice a creature or exile a creature card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on Starving Stalker. Activate only once each turn.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, put a doom counter on Foreboding Presence.
At the beginning of each player's end step, if no spells were cast this turn, sacrifice Foreboding Presence. It deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to that player.
Counter target spell if it wasn't cast from a player's hand.
